body:
## What changed
- Wired `ddns_witness_rewards` for devnet use and ensured Program ID consistency (`AVsmrpWU...`).
- Added/updated `solana/scripts/witness_rewards.ts` CLI (init-config, deposit-bond, fund-reward-vault, submit-batch, claim, status).
- Fixed CLI correctness issues: Anchor v0.32 Program constructor signature, IDL path resolution, PDA-owned token account creation, snake_case decoded fields.
- Added devnet proof run to `solana/VERIFIED.md` and updated `docs/WITNESS_REWARDS_MVP.md`.

## Why
We need an end-to-end devnet proof that the program compiles, is deployed, and is usable from a minimal CLI without hardcoded secrets.

## Commands run (local)
```bash
cd solana
cargo metadata --no-deps
cargo check -p ddns_witness_rewards
anchor build --program-name ddns_witness_rewards
cargo test -p ddns_witness_rewards
```

## Devnet proof (tx sigs)
- Program deploy tx: `3iwB8SUTej49FCstVCZJJzv7FDgJBEx4TDYi2bxpaXtiGS2eScouWQaTQYeokMivZmhmS4Af8CtTNUHECXVrZKT8`
- init-config: `RVwtCZuVVE4bGnDj16yDB11bNXzQQZr6XaDk8o1gpiAt1DLVkXusau5UYimoyksxjdbK6gmiyNJpeMpzQspMjM4`
- deposit-bond: `F2QUhe1LYnQf5KXcGFBdATMwKK3phajE9MsF7RrnjjrqhKijXK5DiHRKA5PyBYY9WG1wcec24kd99NBaRCCv6cF`
- fund-reward-vault: `3pzZpTjsWCmyArTBAF7fm3z74y6t9DCj33AhVZ8T4S7886wDnJyVoELpj4oxqFNDhdUzkTYo2Vtbi7yVZeYjBkAh`
- submit-batch: `5MBo9DX2vok6vzyCj6whk4acPjVjeeXCVgrxccS5qXEUcxfeYd1LH1cCwqJ3Wq5zbagfUEvufLUR2kwkuYfEy1c9`
- claim: `5LvyAUyekZLTgo5PPSvqDNHyXbn9rkUrKpkH2nrgAppBYJK5qtTcwhuMgo2tK2eAzGXzctocsHuMsKBT5UgTxzWN`

Full PDA list + `solana account` proof commands: `solana/VERIFIED.md`.

## Security notes
- No keypair JSON files or `.env` files added.
- CLI defaults to `ANCHOR_WALLET=~/.config/solana/id.json` (not committed).
- Program is permissionless/bond-gated; on-chain does not verify per-receipt signatures in MVP (documented).

commits.messageHeadline: solana: add ddns_witness_rewards with safe anchor feature wiring

title: ddns_witness_rewards: devnet DoD (CLI + proofs)
